original_text: The Philistines heard the news that David had now become king over Israel. So their whole army went to look for him to catch him. When David heard about this, he went out of the city to a strong, safe place.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 다윗에게 기름을 부어 이스라엘 왕으로 삼았다 함을 블레셋 사람들이 듣고 블레셋 사람들이 다윗을 찾으러 다 올라오매 다윗이 듣고 요새로 나가니라

sentences.original_text: that David had now become king over Israel
So their whole army went to look for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들의 모든 군대가 그를 찾으러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: he went out of the city
